section.title: Description
section.p: This class contains information concerning the injection of anesthesia into the epidural space of the spine.

stentry.p: Categorizes the method of administration of the anesthetic agent. Suggested values include: Bolus; Intermittent, Drip infusion, etc.
Contains the volume (typically in milliliters) of the test dose fluid vehicle.
Identifies the drug used for the epidural test dose.
